titles.title: Congressional Travel Reform Act
Requiring that travel awards that accrue by reason of official travel of a Member, officer, or employee of the House of Representatives be used only with respect to official travel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 11/29/1994--Introduced. Congressional Travel Reform Act - Requires that travel awards that accrue by reason of official travel of a Member, officer, or employee of the House of Representatives be used only with respect to official travel.
